Ethiopian Airlines has Launched on-board Wi-Fi service on its A350 fleets using the latest broadband satellite technology (Ka-band).With the state-of-the-art broadband satellite technology, passengers can now enjoy reliable connectivity while flying over the clouds.#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/9bVjL6MSXg

data.text: @Habeshatweet Thank you for contacting us. Please email the error message you are receiving on ETWebsiteSupport@ethiopianairlines.com  so that we can assist you. Regards,

@YididiyaM Dear Yididiya, We are very sorry to hear about the problem you had with your luggage.  Thank you for writing to us about it.Please inbox us your email address along with your booking reference so that we can assist you. Regards

@Oloo_FC Dear Oloo, we do sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you encountered as this is an exception to the high standard of service that we strive to give to our esteemed customers. Kindly inbox us more details of the case along with ticket and email so that we will look into it.

data.text:
@sliman88k Dear @sliman88 , kindly clarify your request via privet message. 
Regards,
@AntonJerntved You are very welcome Anton.

@AntonJerntved Dear Anton ,Online Check-in is available from 36 hours to 2 hours before your departure https://t.co/KtaHxQirAD can also Check-in at the airport counters which are open 3 hours before departure and counters will be closed 1 hour before departure. 
Regards,

@AbdikadarMoham3 Dear Khadar,we do sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you encountered as this is an exception to the high standard of service that we strive to give to our esteemed customers.Please send  more to our customer relation department on customerrelations@ethiopianairlines.com.

Please DM your local contact at Kenya, as Officials from Ethiopian Airlines are looking for you. They could not find any from the booking.
